General.Name: MegaChips Corporation
General.Description: MegaChips Corporation, a semiconductor company, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells products centering on system LSIs in Japan and internationally. It offers application specific integrated circuits; application specific standard products comprising semiconductors and tool kits; modularized semiconductor products, as well as module services; and wireless and wired, as well as power-line communication network solutions for urban infrastructure, such as buildings and factories. The company was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
